DOC.detailed_description: Objective : At present , clinical remission depression define final HAMD score less 7 . However , clinical practice , psychosocial function patient reach remission far complete recovery . The recovery psychosocial function lag behind disappearance symptoms.so , aim determine level residual symptom psychosocial factor affect recovery psychosocial function MDD patient reach remission , investigate recovery process psychosocial function . Method:200 MDD patient meet inclusion criterion randomly divide CBT group control group.All subject would complete psychological assessment 0,1st,2nd,6th 12th month CBT group 0,2nd,12th month control group.ALL participant would undergo magnetic resonance image 0,2nd,12th months.The scan sequence 3D , resting-state , task-state diffusion tensor imaging（DTI）.During magnetic resonance imaging（MRI） scan , subject perform facial gender recognition task three different facial stimulus ( positive/neutral/negative ) .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis major depressive disorder ( MDD ) Hamilton Rating Scale Depression ( HAMD ) less 7 Bipolar disorder Substance dependence Neurological disorder mental disorder Severe body disease
